description: The round payoff this round was 92. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 46.
Mutual cooperation in the game leads to an equal and straightforward payoff split
Defection (choosing Option 2) can result in a lower individual payoff compared to mutual cooperation, depending on the other player's choice
The game rewards predictability and trust in repeated rounds, as past actions like John's choice of Option 1 may influence future strategies
